episodes.title: Recruited to join  a cult Shincheonji (SCJ) in Cape Town PART 2 | Cult Exposed #shincheonji #scj
episodes.description:
TRUE STORY - I was almost recruited to join a cult in Cape Town.

Be careful! Pray for the Spirit of Discernment. 

 This is to warn people to be careful out there. The devil comes as an angel of light. 

These people use all the tactics of Satan to get you to buy into their "Church"

They are liars and manipulators just like their father Satan! 

Be careful of anyone who wants to "be your friend" but they are Wolfs in Sheeps Clothing. #shincheonji #scj #SCJ

The world we live in is Evil. 

Pray for every interaction you make.

What is the Shincheonji Church of Jesus? SCJ

Shincheonji Church of Jesus, the Temple of the Tabernacle of the Testimony (SCJ), commonly known as Shincheonji Church of Jesus or simply Shincheonji New Heaven and New Earth, is a new religious movement established in South Korea by Lee Man-hee. It is considered a pseudo-religion or cult by mainstream churches.

Shincheonji's teachings and beliefs claim that their founder Lee is the pastor promised in the New Testament and that the Book of Revelation is written in secret metaphors (parables) which only Lee is capable of deciphering.  This is what Jesus warned about in Matthew 7:15 and Matthew 24:24 about false prophets coming in sheep’s clothing but are ravenous wolves, and those in this movement believe they speak on behalf of Christ as a witness!

Shincheonji pretends to be Christian and yet denies the Trinity and the Deity of Christ, claiming that it was a man-made concept invented by the Council of Nicaea in 325 AD, while demoting Jesus to be a "Promised Pastor" or basically a prophet.  They believe that their leader, Lee Man-hee, is the "Advocate" mentioned in John 14:16, and that salvation can only be found through his Testimony and organization.  

The apostle Paul warned about those who preach a different/another gospel in Galatians 1:6-9 which the Shincheonji Church of Jesus is teaching leading many people astray into a false religious Cult.

This group is currently infiltrating churches throughout the world, using deceptive wolf in sheep's clothing tactics to propagate. To learn more about this group, visit: 

https://www.examiningthescj.com/
Chris Interview about SCJ:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rf0Rn-_yr2A

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l87mwJh1ujM



Other helpful resources...

http://truthaboutshincheonji.com/

http://shinchonjiandthebible.blogspot...

https://www.reddit.com/r/Shincheonji/

Man Hee Lee's past:   

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W_0GAmSODb0

German video that goes into detail about how deceptive SCJ is and the information collection, manipulation, etc. which happens within:   

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F0WxOE3bUh8
